September 1978: The League of the 47 Ronin

Plays:

The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Scenes:

The Helmet Identification at Tsurugaoka (鶴が岡兜改め)

The Love Poem (恋歌)

The Cutting of the Pine Branch (松切り)

The Bribing of Moronao (大手下馬先進物　)

Okaru Delivers the Letter Case (Kaoyo's Poem) (おかる文使い)

The Attack in the Palace (殿中刃傷)

The Back Gate (裏門)

The Suicide of Hangan (塩谷館判官切腹)

The Evacuation (霞ヶ関城明渡し)

The Encounter on the Yamazaki Highway (山崎街道出合)

The Shooting in the Dark (山崎街道二つ玉)

The Selling of Okaru (お軽身売り)

Kampei's Suicide (勘平腹切)

The Ichiriki Tea House in Gion (祇園一力茶屋)

The Bridal Journey (道行旅路嫁入り)

The Snowball (雪転かし)

Yuranosuke's House at Yamashina (山科閑居)

The Hanamizubashi Bridge (花水橋引揚)
